backend/main.mo: Contains deployment comment instructions for changing the site domain and an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping domain‑config changes to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/DOMAIN_CONFIGURATION.md: Explains how to configure the site domain using the VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL environment variable.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, design tokens, and dark‑mode variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata and script that sets canonical and OG URLs based on configured site origin.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the main page structure containing Header, Hero, Services, About, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/AboutS: Animated About section with company overview text, image, and value list items.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, animations, and hostname‑based UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Scrollable header with logo, navigation links, and responsive mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section with background image, animated reveals, CTA buttons, and stats, including smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Wrapper that animates children into view once using an IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Services grid with icons and descriptions, using SectionReveal for animated entry and textured background.
frontend/src/config/siteUrl.ts: Utility functions for resolving the site's public URL and building absolute URLs from environment config.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, state, and login flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Hook that tracks when an element enters the viewport once using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, typography, animations, and accessibility-focused adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s current state, existing features, and pending feature requests related to domain configuration.
